_librariesioMetadata.description: This is an application I use that automatically tests and marks student code assignments in Algonquin College Graphic Design’s Web Dev courses.

name: Markbot
description: An automated marking application for code projects in the Algonquin College Graphic Design program.
author: Thomas J Bradley <hey@thomasjbradley.ca>

scripts.pack-osx: npm run clean-osx && electron-packager ./ --overwrite --app-version=3.6.0 --build-version=3.6.0 "Markbot" --out=dist/osx --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --asar --asar-unpack-dir=vendor --version=0.37.2 --ignore='(dist/osx|dist/win)' --icon=images/icon.icns --app-copyright='© Thomas J Bradley' --app-bundle-id=ca.thomasjbradley.markbot --app-category-type=public.app-category.developer-tools
scripts.pack-win: npm run clean-win && electron-packager ./ --overwrite --app-version=3.6.0 --build-version=3.6.0 "Markbot" --out=dist/win --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --asar --asar-unpack-dir=vendor --version=0.37.2 --ignore='(dist/osx|dist/win)' --icon=images/icon.ico --app-copyright='© Thomas J Bradley' --version-string={ProductName:'Markbot',LegalCopyright:'© Thomas J Bradley'}
scripts.pack: npm run clean && npm run pack-osx && npm run pack-win
scripts.build: npm run build-osx && npm run build-win
